scripts.install: (npm install -g typescript) && (npm install -g gulp-cli) && (npm install -g nodemon) && (cd client && npm install)
scripts.dev: (cd common && gulp setDevelopmentEnvironment && gulp cleanOutputDirectories && gulp generateTypescriptFiles) && (cd ..) && (concurrently "cd common && npm run dev" "cd api && npm run dev" "cd client && npm run dev" )
